data.name: Pauer View 2024
data.description:
Pauer View, lets you view your 2D and 360° photos taken on a 360 Camera without having to use a desktop computer to transfer your pictures to your Oculus Quest VR headset.

Enjoy your VR pictures with your family and friends using your Oculus Quest VR headset as a gallery for your 360 degree pictures quickly and simply. Create slideshows quickly and start sharing your memories!

Explicitly supported devices:
* GoPro Max
* Insta360
* HTTP image servers

To find out more visit: https://pauerview.softpauer.com/

We will be adding more as we learn about them, so if your camera is missing, email us at pauerview@softpauer.com

translations.long_description:
Pauer View を使用すると、デスクトップ コンピュータを使用して写真を Oculus Quest VR ヘッドセットに転送しなくても、GoPro Max カメラで撮影した 360 度の写真を表示できます。

Oculus Quest VR ヘッドセットを Gopro Max 360 カメラで撮影した 360 度写真のギャラリーとして使用して、家族や友人と一緒に VR 写真を楽しみましょう
translations.short_description: Pauer View を使用すると、PC を使わずに GoPro Max カメラから 360 写真を簡単かつ迅速に表示できます。

translations.long_description:
Pauer View를 사용하면 데스크톱 컴퓨터를 사용하여 사진을 Oculus Quest VR 헤드셋으로 전송할 필요 없이 GoPro Max 카메라로 촬영한 360도 사진을 볼 수 있습니다.

Oculus Quest VR 헤드셋을 Gopro Max 360 카메라로 촬영한 360도 사진 갤러리로 사용하여 가족 및 친구와 함께 VR 사진을 즐겨보세요.
translations.short_description: Pauer View를 사용하면 PC 없이 GoPro Max 카메라에서 360도 사진을 간단하고 빠르게 볼 수 있습니다.

translations.long_description:
Pauer View, lets you view your 360-degree photos taken on a GoPro Max Camera without having to use a desktop computer to transfer your pictures to your Oculus Quest VR headset.

Enjoy your VR pictures with your family and friends using your Oculus Quest VR headset as a gallery for your 360 degree pictures taken on your Gopro Max 360 camera
translations.short_description: Pauer View allows you to view your 360 photos simply and quickly from a GoPro Max Camera without a PC.

changelog.change_log:
Version 0.7



- App now supports downloads for Insta360 cameras

- App now supports downloads from a HTTP file server

  - The server currently must have autoindex on in the config settings for this feature to work

Version 0.6

- 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional photos support rotation
- Rendering automatically detects and renders 360° and non-360° media appropriately
- Fixed an issue where cameras were not being detected
- Fixed an issue where placeholders were not being removed

Version 0.5

- 2-dimensional rendering now supports dynamic aspect ratios
- Fix pause and play buttons to correctly reflect the state of play
- Fix permissions missing errors
- Changed UI navigation to show when beginning a slide and hide when returning to the home screen
- UI navigation now hidden on start
- Removed external read/write permission
- Now cannot progress through camera connection flow without necessary permissions enabled
- Remove GoPro Cam from the list of devices shown
Initial release. Please note we only support the GoPro 360 Max camera for this release. More support for other devices coming soon!
